verbs.description: [V: Has] President Donald Trump , his lawyer Michael Cohen or anyone at the White House lied about the hush money paid to porn actress Stormy Daniels just before the 2016 presidential election ?

Has [ARG0: President Donald Trump , his lawyer Michael Cohen or anyone at the White House] [V: lied] [ARG1: about the hush money paid to porn actress Stormy Daniels just before the 2016 presidential election] ?

Has President Donald Trump , his lawyer Michael Cohen or anyone at the White House lied about [ARG1: the hush money] [V: paid] [ARG2: to porn actress Stormy Daniels] [ARGM-TMP: just before the 2016 presidential election] ?
